channel.title: Comments on: Choosing the right training for you

item.title: By: Marci
item.dc:creator: Marci
item.description: You know this really is a struggle with most teachers and students. I'm in the education field and understand both spectrums of this article. Just do your research!!
item.content:encoded: You know this really is a struggle with most teachers and students. I’m in the education field and understand both spectrums of this article. Just do your research!!

item.title: By: SQLArcher
item.dc:creator: SQLArcher
item.description: What will your personal suggestion then be for more skilled DBA's to find training (which is not self study). This apart from something like SQLSkills training which costs quite a bit.
item.content:encoded: What will your personal suggestion then be for more skilled DBA’s to find training (which is not self study). This apart from something like SQLSkills training which costs quite a bit.
